portal_intro: Welcome to the official Assista portal of Roxas City.
info_step1: Make sure you are a resident of Roxas City.
info_step2: Prepare clear photos of your Valid ID and Barangay Indigency.
info_step3: Review the requirements below for your specific need.
help_office: CSWDO Office, Inzo Arnaldo Village, Roxas City
no_applications_sub: You don't have any applications yet.
status_review: Your application is currently under review. Please keep your lines open.
status_expired: This application has passed the 7-day validity period.
status_approved: Approved! You may now download your claim stub.
form_subtitle: Please fill out the details accurately to avoid delays in processing.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the AICS program.
faq_q1: Who is qualified to apply for AICS?
faq_a1: Residents of Roxas City who are in crisis situations (medical, burial, educational, etc.) and are classified as indigent.
faq_q2: What documents do I need for Medical Assistance?
faq_a2: You need a Personal Letter to the Mayor, Final Hospital Bill, Medical Abstract/Certificate, and a Promissory Note if discharged.
faq_q3: How long does the approval process take?
faq_a3: It usually takes 1-3 working days depending on the availability of funds and completeness of your documents.
faq_q4: Can I apply for multiple types of assistance at once?
faq_a4: No. You can only have one active application at a time. Once settled, you may apply again.
faq_q5: Where can I get a Certificate of Indigency?
faq_a5: You can request a Certificate of Indigency from your respective Barangay Hall.
faq_q6: Is there a limit to the financial assistance?
faq_a6: Yes. The amount depends on the assessment of the Social Worker and the available budget for the month.
